metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18197 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
In mxGraphViewImageReader.java in mxGraph before 3.7.6, theSAXParserFactory instance in convert() is missing flags to prevent XMLExternal Entity (XXE) attacks, as demonstrated by /ServerView.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18197` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjgraphx-java - 2.1.0.7-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libjgraphx-java package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.0.7-2').
